job.title: je
job.description:
{"@context": "http://schema.org", "@type": "JobPosting", "datePosted": "2021-08-24T01:12:25.000Z", "description": "

We are seeking a Senior Data Engineer to help us build our highly programmable and scalable data pipelines from the ground up using public cloud infrastructure and services. Your position requires hands-on development and data schema modeling while collaborating closely with the team in driving the critical technical decisions and infrastructure needed to launch, support, and ramp the product in a fast-paced environment. You are a thinker-doer who can think broadly. Still, deep dive into details, align with product management on requirements and priorities towards producing a best-in-class product experience and help shape the team culture.


Recommended Skills

  • Extensive background in CS, or equivalent experience
  • A deep understanding of Cloud data warehouses/lakes, relational databases, distributed systems, Massively Parallel Processing (MPP) databases, and No-SQL databases. 
  • Experience developing and optimizing large-scale batch and real-time data pipelines.
  • Able to build robust, reliable, and scalable data infrastructure.
  • Demonstrated ability to architect and implement data pipelines and data models.
  • An analytics mindset to analyze large data sets to identify gaps and inconsistencies, provide data insights, and advance effective product solutions.
  • Experience performing in ETL with a combination of SQL and python. 
  • Shipped products and worked across teams.
  • Excellent communication skills, both written and verbal


Benefits

  • MacBook Air/Pro
  • Vision, dental, and medical plan choices
  • Flexible working hours
  • Competitive salary & 401(K)
  • Flexible/Personal Time Off
  • Employee Stock Purchase Plans, and other financial benefits
  • Paid Holidays
